mapper.sql: id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, deleted_flag, name, url, status
mapper.insert: insert into t_contract_template (id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, deleted_flag, name, url, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update t_contract_template
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted_flag = #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_contract_template set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted_flag = #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_contract_template where deleted_flag = 0
and status = #{status}
order by id desc
